password_sniffer.name: password_sniffer
password_sniffer.function: Sniffs for user roles on a target IP and cracks passwords starting from the lowest user role level.

lan_sniffer.name: lan_sniffer
lan_sniffer.function: Sniffs for new local network connections.

packet_decoder.name: packet_decoder
packet_decoder.function: Decodes captured packets to extract information.

user_enum.name: user_enum
user_enum.function: Finds and deciphers users and their roles.

rootkit.name: rootkit
rootkit.function: Installs hidden access to a system for ongoing control.

ssh_exploit.name: ssh_exploit
ssh_exploit.function: Exploits vulnerabilities in SSH to gain access.

exploit_kit.name: exploit_kit
exploit_kit.function: Exploits known vulnerabilities to gain access.

advanced_exploit_kit.name: advanced_exploit_kit
advanced_exploit_kit.function: Exploits advanced vulnerabilities to gain access.

sql_injector.name: sql_injector
sql_injector.function: Performs SQL injection attacks to manipulate databases.

buffer_overflow_exploit.name: buffer_overflow_exploit
buffer_overflow_exploit.function: Exploits buffer overflow vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code.

remote_code_execution_exploit.name: remote_code_execution_exploit
remote_code_execution_exploit.function: Executes arbitrary code on a remote system.

privilege_escalation_tool.name: privilege_escalation_tool
privilege_escalation_tool.function: Gains higher privileges than normally allowed.

zero_day_exploit.name: zero_day_exploit
zero_day_exploit.function: Uses an undisclosed vulnerability to gain access to a system.

firewall_bypass_tool.name: firewall_bypass_tool
firewall_bypass_tool.function: Bypasses firewall restrictions to access a target system.

data_exfiltrator.name: data_exfiltrator
data_exfiltrator.function: Extracts large volumes of data from a target system.

log_cleaner.name: log_cleaner
log_cleaner.function: Erases traces of hacking activities from system logs.

social_engineering_toolkit.name: social_engineering_toolkit
social_engineering_toolkit.function: Uses social engineering tactics to gather information or access.

honeypot_detector.name: honeypot_detector
honeypot_detector.function: Identifies and avoids honeypots set up to trap hackers.

phishing_kit.name: phishing_kit
phishing_kit.function: Creates convincing phishing campaigns to steal credentials.

stealth_virus.name: stealth_virus
stealth_virus.function: Infects systems without being detected by antivirus software.

botnet_controller.name: botnet_controller
botnet_controller.function: Manages a network of compromised devices to perform various attacks.

encryption_breaker.name: encryption_breaker
encryption_breaker.function: Breaks through advanced encryption to access secured data.

malware_injector.name: malware_injector
malware_injector.function: Injects malicious software into target systems.

web_shell.name: web_shell
web_shell.function: Provides remote access to a compromised web server.

firmware_hacker.name: firmware_hacker
firmware_hacker.function: Modifies firmware to gain persistent low-level access.

security_scanner.name: security_scanner
security_scanner.function: Scans for vulnerabilities in a target system's security setup.

proxy_network.name: proxy_network
proxy_network.function: Uses a network of proxy servers to hide the hacker's location.

ai_defender_bot.name: ai_defender_bot
ai_defender_bot.function: Automates the defense of systems, identifying and neutralizing threats.
ai_defender_bot.special: Automatically defends against detected attacks, reducing damage by 50%.

signal_interceptor.name: signal_interceptor
signal_interceptor.function: Intercepts and analyzes wireless signals for data extraction.

darknet_market_access.name: darknet_market_access
darknet_market_access.function: Provides access to a marketplace for buying and selling illegal goods.
darknet_market_access.special: Allows trade of rare tools and exploits.

crypto_wallet_hacker.name: crypto_wallet_hacker
crypto_wallet_hacker.function: Targets cryptocurrency wallets to steal funds.

ddos_cannon.name: ddos_cannon
ddos_cannon.function: Launches a Distributed Denial of Service attack to overwhelm a target.

bandwidth_miner.name: bandwidth_miner
bandwidth_miner.function: Mines bandwidth currency from compromised systems.

ai_hacker_bot.name: ai_hacker_bot
ai_hacker_bot.function: An AI-powered bot that automates hacking tasks and learns over time.
ai_hacker_bot.special: Improves efficiency with use, reducing resource costs by 10% for each successful hack.

quantum_decryptor.name: quantum_decryptor
quantum_decryptor.function: Uses quantum computing to decrypt highly secure communications.
